name: AV-17
description: AV-17 is a FREE 2D action platformer inspired by information technology and BUBBLE BOBBLE!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any Modern Card In Last Several Years Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Modern Card In Last Several Years Storage: 150 MB available space
